name: Traffic Squirrel
description:
This is version 0.2 of "Traffic Squirrel", a simple Frogger-clone created in Unity 2020.2.3f1, for learning purposes. 

If the squirrel successfully crosses the road, it will gain 10 points. If the squirrel gets hit by a car, it will lose 10 points. The squirrel can only move forward, by left-clicking a mouse button.
